bill.title: Online Voter Registration
bill.description: Requires electronic voter registration on the website of the office of elections by January 1, 2014. Establishes requirements for online voter registration, including identification and affidavits. Effective July 1, 2011. (HB545 CD1)

history.action: (H) Pending introduction.
(H) Introduced and Pass First Reading.
(H) Referred to JUD, FIN, referral sheet 1

Oshiro, Souki, Tsuji; Ayes with reservations: Representative(s) Fontaine, Marumoto, Thielen; Noes: none; and 2 Excused: Representative(s) Carroll, Morita.

(H) Passed Second Reading as amended in HD 1 and referred to the committee(s) on FIN with none voting no (0) and Ito excused (1).
(H) Bill scheduled to be heard by FIN on Tuesday, 03-01-11 12:00PM in House conference room 308.

(H) The committees on FIN recommend that the measure be PASSED, UNAMENDED. The votes were as follows: 17 Ayes: M. Oshiro, M. Lee, Chong, Choy, Coffman, Cullen, Har, Hashem, Ichiyama, Jordan, C. (S) Received from House (Hse. Com. No. 118).

(H) Conference Committee Meeting will reconvene on Thursday 04-28-11 8:30PM in conference room 325.
